snippet.title: Official Steam Trailer | Path of the Martyrs
snippet.description:
A classic JRPG story.  Follow Saiyato and his past as you remember the passing of the Princess of Delma, and slowly discover why you have come to Lidoffad Lab....

Available now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1381460/Path_of_the_Martyrs




Angel Star Studios on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/AngelStarStudio


#RPG #retro #YouTubeGaming #steamgames
